title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Hydrology Labs: Measurement and analysis of rainfall, evapotranspiration, infiltration and streamflow; water balance studies, design of rain-gauge network, measurement of flow in open and pressure conduits, measurement of major and minor friction head losses, measurement of sediment load, in situ determination of soil moisture, computation of crop water requirements and irrigation schedule, watershed delineation and characterization. Groundwater Labs: Groundwater investigation by Resistivity Meter and EM Meter, preparation of well logs, monitoring of groundwater level and quality, computation of groundwater inflow and outflow by flownet method, preparation of groundwater contour maps and their analysis, determination of hydraulic parameters of confined, and unconfined aquifer systems by pumping test, analysis of stepdrawdown test data. Water Quality Labs: Water characteristics and quality determination; physical, chemical and bacteriological analysis of water, BOD test, alum dose, settling tests, filtration, Langalier s index and flocculation tests.
